#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int i;
    unsigned long long fac[22];
    fac[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=20;i++)
    {
        fac[i]=fac[i-1]*i;
    }
   // printf("%llu\n",fac[20]);
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        unsigned long long ans;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        ans=fac[n];
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(i&1)
            ans=ans-fac[n]/fac[i];
            else
                ans=ans+fac[n]/fac[i];
        }
        printf("%llu\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
